entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
